sense.gloss: (a) stop (e.g. in a timber joint, or at the end of a kanji stroke)
remaining (e.g. poste-restante)
forty-five degree angle
studying abroad
(temporarily) studying at another school (to learn a specific skill)
overseas student, exchange student
to stop, to turn off
to park
to prevent, to suppress (a cough), to hold back (tears), to hold (one's breath), to relieve (pain)
to stop (someone from doing something), to dissuade, to forbid, to prohibit
to notice, to be aware of, to concentrate on, to pay attention to, to remember, to bear in mind
to fix (in place), to fasten, to tack, to pin, to nail, to button, to staple
to detain, to keep in custody
to stop, to stay (e.g. the night), to cease, to put an end to
to contain, to keep (in position, in place), to limit
to record (e.g. a fact), to retain
heeding, paying attention, bearing in mind
to stop (moving), to come to a stop
to stop (doing, working, being supplied), to come to a halt, to cease, to be stopped, to be suspended
to alight, to perch on
to remain, to abide, to stay (in the one place)
to be limited to, to be confined to, to only account for
stopping at, going no further than
staying behind, remaining, residual

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるも↑自由↑↓じゆう↓にしなさい。
sdata.e: You may go or stay at will.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるもあなたの↑自由↑↓じゆう↓です。
sdata.e: You may go or stay at will.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑留守↑↓るす↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓にメグから↑電話↑↓でんわ↓があった。
sdata.e: Meg called you during your absence.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるも↑君↑↓きみ↓↑次第↑↓しだい↓だよ。
sdata.e: You can go or stay, as you wish.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑留守↑↓るす↓だったので、がっかりした。
sdata.e: I was disappointed at your absence.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓くにバスの↑停留所↑↓ていりゅうじょ↓があります。
sdata.e: There is a bus stop near by.

sdata.j: ↑教授↑↓きょうじゅ↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑書↑↓か↓き↑留↑↓と↓めておいてくれませんか。
sdata.e: Can you take notes for me during the professor's talk?

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑遺留↑↓いりゅう↓↑品↑↓ひん↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つから↑突↑↓とっ↓きとめられた。
sdata.e: The burglar was traced by one of the things he had left on the scene.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑遺留↑↓いりゅう↓↑品↑↓ひん↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つから↑足↑↓あし↓がついた。
sdata.e: The burglar was traced by one of the things he had left on the scene.

sdata.j: ↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓で↑留守↑↓るす↓をしている↑間↑↓かん↓、↑子供↑↓こども↓のめんどうをみてくれますか。
sdata.e: Would you look after my children while I am away on vacation?

words.gloss: (a) stop (e.g. in a timber joint, or at the end of a kanji stroke)
